Name: The Central House Barcelona Gracia
Description:
TCH Barcelona Grácia is within 100 metres of Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia, next to Palau Robert Gardens.

Set in a 19th-century building, TCH Barcelona Grácia offers simple, modern décor and includes a communal lounge area and kitchen. Rooms and dorms have free Wi-Fi, bunk beds, heating and either a private or shared bathroom.

There is also a pretty terrace with sofas, plants and a pergola.

La Pedrera and the Egyptian Museum are within 5 minutes’ walk of the Rodamón. Cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the Gràcia district, less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 2 stops from Diagonal Metro Station.

Name: Sonder Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Well situated in Barcelona, Sonder Paseo de Gracia offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. This 5-star hotel offers a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set a few steps from Passeig de Gracia.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, while certain units at the hotel also have a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Sonder Paseo de Gracia include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 16 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. The property is around 16 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 16 km from Camp Nou and 18 km from Sants Railway Station. Guests can grab a bite to eat in the restaurant or a drink at the bar and free WiFi is available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Montjuïc is 18 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 18 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Hotel SB Icaria
Description:
Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace.

Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

Name: Hotel Glòries
Description:
This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also reserve tickets.

Name: Casa Lit Barcelona
Description:
Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartment Creu Coberta
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartment Creu Coberta is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.8 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is located less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 800 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from Stay U-nique Apartment Creu Coberta, while Boqueria Market is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

Name: Hostal Barcelona
Description:
Located 15 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and Plaça Espanya, Hostal Barcelona has rooms with air conditioning, TV and free Wi-Fi. Famous for its theatres, Parallel Avenue is 100 metres away.

Hostal Barcelona can provide tourist information, assist with ticket reservations including the Barcelona Tourist Bus, and help arrange car/bike rental. There is an internet terminal in reception. A luggage storage service is available and all rooms have a safe. Reception is available 24 hours.

A continental breakfast buffet is served from 07:30 to 10:30 It offers different kinds of bread, butter, jams, cornflakes, yogurt, cheese, ham, salami, croissants, chocolate croissants, muffins, biscuits, gaufres, Nutella, fruit, juice, coffee, milk and tea. Cold and hot drinks and pastries are available 24 hours a day. Guests also have access to a microwave. There is a supermarket in the same building, restaurants and bars in the surroundings.

Parallel Metro Station and many bus routes are 100 metres from Hostal Barcelona. The Fira Convention Centre is 12 minutes away by public transport. Montjuïc is a 5-minute walk from the guest house, and the Old Harbour can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Name: ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 900 metres from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

A TV is available.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 1.5 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

Name: Tembo Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, Tembo Barcelona features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. 1.4 km from Forum Beach and 1.9 km from Platja del Litoral, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Tembo Barcelona also feature a city view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is available at the accommodation. At Tembo Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

There is an in-house snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

Port Olimpic is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Sagrada Familia is 4.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: Hotel Rialto
Description:
Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
Description:
Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at Occidental Barcelona 1929 can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Sants Railway Station is 1 km from the accommodation, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Barceló Raval
Description:
Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

Name: Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona. Modern
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona. Modern offers free WiFi and air conditioning. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic
Description:
Conveniently set in Barcelona, Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is close to Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Passeig de Gracia. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. The units include a safety deposit box.

A continental breakfast is available at the hotel.

A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic. Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English and Spanish, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Ronda Lesseps
Description:
The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

Name: Pensión 45
Description:
This establishment is housed in a building of great artistic interest, built at the beginning of the 19th century.

The building is tranquil and comfortable and has conserved part of its original decoration. On offer here is simple accommodation combined with a warm and cosy atmosphere.

Pension 45 is perfectly positioned in the centre of the old town, with good connections to the public transport network, enabling you to move within and around the city. The Renfe train station is only metres away from the accommodation. This is the ideal place from which to see the heart of Barcelona and benefit to the maximum from its culture, shopping and nightlife. Nearby are also the MACBA, Las Ramblas, Plaça Catalunya and the central University building.

Name: Alojamiento Diputacion
Description:
Situated less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Alojamiento Diputacion offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station and features a shared kitchen. Guests can enjoy city views.

At the homestay, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.2 km from the homestay, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@
Description:
Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@ is located in Barcelona’s Glòries district, 500 metres from Torre Agbar. It offers a fitness centre, 24-hour bar and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV.

All rooms at the Ibis Plaza Glòries have air conditioning and heating. They also have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout.

The Hotel Ibis Plaza Glòries has a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast. Rates with breakfast included does not include breakfast for children. Children under 12 can enjoy breakfast for 4 euros per person

Llacuna and Glòries Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From here you can reach Plaza Catalunya or Barceloneta Beach in under 10 minutes.

Name: Ohla Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas.

Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter.

Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar.

The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna.

The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Name: Ohla Eixample
Description:
Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service.

Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV with eRoom Cast, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available.

The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar.

Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request.

Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

Name: Axel TWO Barcelona 4 Sup - Adults Only
Description:
Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a  24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided.

Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout.

Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife.

The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

Name: Hotel Paxton Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel Paxton Barcelona features certain rooms with pool views, and each room comes with a kettle. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: htop BCN City #htopEnjoy
Description:
htop BCN City is located next to the impressive Hospital Sant Pau and 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

The rooms at htop BCN City feature simple décor and a work desk. Each one has a private bathroom, and many offer views of the Hospital de Sant Pau.

The htop BCN City has a 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a typical 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.

Name: Residencia Universitaria Campus del Mar
Description:
Residencia Campus del Mar has an excellent location in Barcelona's Barceloneta neighbourhood, 200 metres from the beach. It features a fitness centre and free internet in rooms and public areas.

Each room at Residencia Campus del Mar has a kitchen area with a microwave and tea/coffee facilities. Most also have a TV.

Guests can make use of the library area and games room with snooker and table tennis at the Residencia. Private parking, a laundrette and 24-hour reception are available on site. Bicycles are available to rent, upon prior request.

There is also a range of vending machines.

Ciutadella Park and the Paseo Marítimo are within a 2-minute walk of Residencia Campus del Mar. Barceloneta Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The Hostal Marenostrum’s en suite accommodation is functional and comfortable, including air conditioning, heating and soundproofing, for a restful stay. All bathrooms include a hairdryer. You can also make the most of 24-hour reception to explore the nightlife.

The Hotel has a meeting room with magnificent views of the Ramblas.

Hotel Colonial’s bright, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors. They are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV and minibar. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Set in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter beside the city's old Roman walls, The Moods Catedral is an Adult Only hotel, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral and 100 metres from Jaume I Metro Station. It offers bright, modern rooms with free WiFi.

Set on the first floor of a Modernist-style building, the stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature unique ceilings and include a private bathroom with a hairdryer. We don't guarantee the view of the exterior rooms as we have Cathedral, Via Laietana and Plaza Ramon Berenguer views.

Name: Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou
Description:
This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

The Gaudi Hotel's restaurant serves American Buffet breakfast. There is also a Bar on site.

This hotel has a 24-hour Reception and Parking is available next to the hotel.

Name: BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat offers air conditioning. It is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Park Güell is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat.

Name: Hotel Alguer Camp Nou
Description:
Hotel L’Alguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the L’Alguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

Name: Hotel Balmoral
Description:
Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

Name: Castro Exclusive Residences Sant Pau
Description:
Located in Horta-Guinardó, a quiet residential neighbourhood just 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Família, Castro Exclusive Residences Sant Pau offers fully-equipped accommodation with free Wi-Fi. An ecological car rental service is also available.

All bright, air-conditioned apartments feature a modern décor with parquet floors, modern furnishings and LED lighting. Each is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, an iPod dock and a washing machine. They overlook the street or an interior patio.

You will find plenty of small shops and restaurants within less than 5 minutes walk of Castro Exclusive Residences Sant Pau.

You can borrow films and music from the apartment complex’s multimedia library. Here you will also find 2 flat-screen TVs with a surround sound system.

Guinardó Park is just a 10-minute walk away and Park Güell can be reached in 30 minutes on foot. Hospital de Sant Pau metro station is just 100 metres away

Name: Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia and 2.5 km from La Pedrera. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a lift, and organising tours for guests.

The 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia.

Name: Praktik Rambla
Description:
Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

Description:
Apartamento al lado de Sagrada Familia features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 400 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km of La Pedrera. It is situated 2.6 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. This pet-friendly apartment also has free WiFi.

Name: Catalonia Albeniz
Description:
Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Friendly Barcelona Hotel with free WiFi, free Continental Buffet Breakfast and easy access to the beach and city sights.

Holiday Inn Express® Barcelona City 22@ hotel is located in the hip 22@Barcelona business zone, formerly an industrial district of Poblenou. Llacuna Metro Station is four minutes walk from the hotel. The B-10, also known as Ronda Litoral, Coastal Ring Road is minutes away by car and on-site parking is available. It’s a 25-minute drive to Barcelona El Prat Airport (BCN). Unwind on Mar Bella Beach, a short stroll from the hotel. On the nearby Rambla del Poblenou, restaurants offering catalan and international food are popular.

Barcelona attractions, like Sagrada Familia and Park Guell, are within easy reach by public transportation. Westfield Glories Mall is only 10 minutes walking from our door and Diagonal Mar Mall less than 10 minutes away by taxi.

Bright, colourful guest rooms offer free WiFi to keep you connected.
Enjoy our family rooms with double bed and sofa bed available for a max. of 2 adults and 2 children.
Get set for the day with an Express Start Breakfast buffet free to all our guests.
In the evening, simply step outside the door to experience Barcelona's lively night out.

Name: Barcelona Central Apartments
Description:
Barcelona Central Apartments is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1 km from Casa Batllo and 800 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach. The property is 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Barcelona Central Apartments.

Featuring soundproofed rooms and free WiFi, Cosmo Apartments Rambla Catalunya is located in central Barcelona, only 6 minutes on foot from Plaça Catalunya Square.

These modern and bright apartments come with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The kitchenette includes oven, dishwasher, a microwave and a coffee machine and the living area has a sofa and a flat-screen TV.  Bed linen and towels are provided.

Guests can order gourmet food baskets upon arrival.
Guests will find many bars, restaurants and shops in the lively and central Rambla de Catalunya. The closest supermarket is just 500 metres away.

Barcelona’s La Rambla Street is 600 metres from the property and Gaudi’s Casa Batlló building is a 3-minute walk away. The apartment is just 200 metres from Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and its metro and train station, with direct connection with El Prat Airport.

Located a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hola Hostal Eixample offers a sun terrace, a private bar, a 24-hour reception and stylish air-conditioned dormitories with free Wi-Fi. Barcelona Nord Bus Station is 500 metres away.

Each spacious dormitory at the Hola Eixample hostel features bright modern décor and individual storage lockers. Sheets and blankets are included, while towels are available to rent. Some rooms have a private bathroom.

Hola Hostal Eixample is just a 10-minute walk from the Born district, where you can find charming shops, bars and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Church and Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk.

Name: Best House Best Place
Description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 3-minute walk from Jaume I Metro Station, Best House Best Place offers apartments with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

These modern apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV. The adjoining kitchen is equipped with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine. Some apartments have a small balcony.

The property is situated in the lively Borne area, famous for its restaurants, bars, and artisan shops. La Rambla is 900 metres away and a 15-minute walk takes you to Barceloneta Beach.

This central guest house is on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station, and 50 metres from La Boqueria Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms, with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.

Public parking is available near the Hostal Las Flores Ramblas, but the great location means the city’s main tourist sites can be visited on foot.

Barcelona Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

TSA La Rambla is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.1 km from Sant Sebastian Beach. The property features city views and is 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation provides a lift, private check-in and check-out and organising tours for guests.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Name: Suite Home Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated on tree-lined Gaudí Avenue, Suite Home Barcelona is just 250 metres from the Sagrada Familia cathedral. Some apartments offer views of Barcelona’s famous monument. Free WiFi is available.

All air-conditioned apartments have parquet flooring. The living and dining area is equipped with a flat-screen TV.  A safe is also provided. All apartments are different, there may be 2 complete bathrooms or 1 complete bathroom + 1 extra shower + 1 extra toilet. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast city views. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

ME Barcelona offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

Name: Oriente Atiram

Name: Hotel Lyon
Description:
Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

Situated within 3 km of Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sant Pau Suites features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Name: Penthouse Pza España - 4th Floor
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, Penthouse Pza España - 4th Floor offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.9 km from Casa Batllo and 3.2 km from Palau Sant Jordi. Camp Nou is 3.3 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Name: Evenia Rossello
Description:
Evenia Rossello is conveniently situated 5 minutes’ walk from the stylish Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and includes a gym. The modern rooms feature wooden floors and free internet connection.

The contemporary L'Illa del Rosselló restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can also enjoy tapas on the terrace, set in small gardens called Placeta Joan Brossa.

Evenia Rossello’s tour desk can provide useful information on the city and arrange car rental. A luggage storage service is also available.

Diagonal Metro Station is 400 metres away and offers direct access to Barcelona city centre. Barcelona Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hostal Balmes Centro
Description:
Hostal Balmes Centro offers 24-hour reception with tourist information service, free WiFi and free luggage storage. It is located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and from one of Gaudi's masterpieces, la Pedrera.

All rooms at Hostal Balmes Centro have a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a fridge. Rooms come with double or twin beds, and a private or shared bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided.

 You can find numerous restaurants and bars with traditional tapas in the surrounding area.

Car hire, bicycle rental and tours can be organized at Hostal Balmes Centro’s tour desk. Plaza Catalunya Square and Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes’ walk and Casa Batlló House and Museum is 500 metres away.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 minutes’ drive away. Regular airport trains leave from a train station located just 550 metres away.

Name: GORGEOUS APARTMENT IN DOWNTOWN
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, GORGEOUS APARTMENT IN DOWNTOWN has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.6 km from Boqueria Market and 1.8 km from Sants Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like windsurfing.

Popular points of interest near GORGEOUS APARTMENT IN DOWNTOWN include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
Description:
Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

Name: Hotel Brummell
Description:
Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theatre. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.

The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.

All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.

FUNKY, Hotel Brummell’s new restaurant, offers a delightful eatery concept. An in-house bakery prepares a daily breakfast with a selection of oven-baked croissant and breads, local cheeses, olives, charcuteries, mató and honeycomb, Funky’s granola, whipped butter and house jam, seasonal fresh fruits and veggies, accompanied by a soft boiled egg. Pair your treats with their Nomad Filter Coffee, and experience the perfect harmony of flavors in a cozy, inviting atmosphere.

Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 250 m away.

For guests who wish to explore the sights of Barcelona, Montjuïc is known for its parks and gardens and is within 10 minutes' walk. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Name: Hotel del Mar
Description:
Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.3 km from Casa Batllo, Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome offers air conditioning. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

Name: Bonanova Park
Description:
This family-run hotel is located 700 metres from the Politècnica de Catalunya University and Palau Reial Gardens. Bonanova Park offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at the Bonanova Park has a simple, functional design. Rooms come with a CD player, minibar (drinks and snacks not included) and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied buffet breakfast served in the Bonanova Park’s breakfast room. There are also numerous bars and restaurants in the charming Sarria neighbourhood, a 10-minute walk away.

Hotel Bonanova Park is around 1 km from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, and a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 500 metres away, and offers direct links to the city centre and to the Palau de Congressos Conference Centre, 2 stops away.

Private parking can be found near the hotel.

Name: Hotel Best Auto Hogar
Description:
Set on Parallel Avenue, Hotel Auto Hogar is just opposite Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some of Barcelona’s most popular theatres can be found within 5 minutes’ walk, while Montjuïc hill is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel. The Fira Exhibition Centre is just over 1 km away.

The Auto Hogar Hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and is open 7 days a week. The hotel also has a café.

The hotel reception offers free newspapers, and can arrange bicycle and car hire.

Name: Abba Garden
Description:
This modern hotel is situated on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool and the gym . Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.

Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.

Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.

Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city centre is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.

Name: NH Barcelona Diagonal Center
Description:
This design hotel is situated 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 350 metres away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.

The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.

You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Centre is also within a 10-minute walk.

This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business centre. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Airport is about 18 km away, while CCIB Convention Centre is 3km away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

Name: Super Balmes Guest House
Description:
Super Balmes Guest House is located in Barcelona city center, 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The Guest House offers private rooms in shared apartments located in different building of the same central area.

They all come with a flat-screen TV and have a shared or private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use and a shared lounge with sofas.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distances. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located within 10-minute walk.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different rooms and apartments located in the Barcelona City Center area. Please select a date and click on the room type to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: Catalonia Castellnou
Description:
Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

Name: Hostal Mont Thabor
Description:
This comfortable guest house is set on Las Ramblas, 50 metres from the Boqueria Market. It offers free Wi-Fi and, 24-hour reception and cosy rooms with a TV, 1 minutes’ walk from Liceu Metro Station.

Hostal Mont Thabor’s bright rooms feature modern décor and some include a balcony, in some cases, overlooking Las Ramblas. Bathrooms are shared or private.

The property offers free passes to nightclubs and has a comfortable TV lounge and computer. There is a gift shop on the ground floor and several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk.

The property is within 5 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Real. The MACBA Contemporary Art Museum is 600 metres away and chic Passeig de Gracia is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Mont Thabor is 10 minutes’ walk from the port. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from plaza Catalunya, 500 metres away.

Name: Hostal Benidorm
Description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

Name: Catalonia Mikado
Description:
This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.

The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.

The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.

Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

Name: ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments
Description:
These apartments without elevator access are located in the district of Barceloneta, surrounded by seafood restaurants and set beside the city’s sandy beaches.

ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments can accommodate 2 people per apartment.  They allow families and groups of friends to enjoy independent accommodation in the heart of The Catalan capital.

The apartment's location is near to train, metro and bus services, meaning that you can easily visit the many cultural sights of this inspiring city. Las Ramblas and the lively district of El Born are only a few minutes walk away.

This historic fishing district is also a short distance from the Olympic Port.

Name: Golden Hotel Barcelona
Description:

Name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests.

Featuring a PS2, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Well and Come Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.

Hotel Well and Come Barcelona features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

Name: Chic & Basic Lemon Boutique Hotel
Description:
Set between the 2 main squares at the centre of Barcelona – Catalunya and Universitat – this small, modern hotel is ideally located for exploring the city’s cultural heart.

Chic & Basic Lemon is just off the top of the vibrant La Rambla and a short walk from the Gothic Quarter. It is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the start of the elegant boulevard of Passeig de Gràcia – site of Modernist marvels such as Casa Batlló.

Here you can take advantage of the great family service offered in this small property.

After seeing the sights, spend a restful night’s sleep in your own spacious bedroom. In it you will find amenities such as a digital TV, free safe and en suite bathroom with full bathtub. In addition, climate control allows you to stay in comfort all year round.

Name: Catalonia Park Güell
Description:
Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell.

Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.

The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.

The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.

There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

Name: Grand Hotel Central, Small Luxury Hotels
Description:
Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi.

The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast . Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries.

The restaurant offers an authentic Spanish-style dining experience with small "platillos" to be shared, as well as a selection of over 150 local and national wines. An excellent culinary proposal that will make you feel like a local. La Terraza del Central, in the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona.

The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle.

The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

Name: SM Hotel Teatre Auditori
Description:
SM Hotel Teatre Auditori is located opposite the Catalan National Theatre, close to Glòries and Monumental Metro Stations. This stylish hotel features rooms with satellite TV.

The Auditori has bright, attractive décor. Each air-conditioned room has a desk and a safety deposit box.

Breakfast is served in the hotel café.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s attractions, as well as arrange bicycle and car rental.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Glòries Metro is just 4 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

Name: Catalonia Roma
Description:
Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.

Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.

Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

Name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
Description:
Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

Name: Unite Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Nova Icaria, Unite Hostel Barcelona offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel features family rooms.

At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Unite Hostel Barcelona include Somorrostro, Bogatell and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the hostel.

Name: Green House Hotel
Description:
This modern hotel is located directly across from the Auditori and 50 metres from the National Theatre. It offers bright, air-conditioned rooms, 250 metres from Monumental Bull Ring.

Rooms at Green House Hotel Diagonal feature stylish, contemporary décor. Each includes a smart TV, safe box, desk and private bathroom with hairdryer.

Glories Shopping Centre is 500 metres away and Ciutadella Park and the Born district are 10 minutes’ walk away.

Other facilities include Airport Shuttle at an extra charge.

Green House Hotel is close to the Barcelona Encants Market and only 10 minutes’ walk from the iconic Sagrada Familia Basilica. Marina Metro Station is 400 metres away, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Estacio del Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Hostal Europa
Description:
This guest house is 100 metres from Liceu Metro Station and Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. Hostal Europa offers basic rooms in a central location, and has free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Most rooms at the Europa have shared bathroom facilities. Rooms with a private ensuite bathroom are available.

Barcelona’s main tourist attractions are within a short walk. The Boqueria Market is 200 metres from the Europa, and Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Catalunya are a 5-minute walk away.

The Hostal Europa has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car or bicycle at the tour desk.

A continental breakfast is served at a neighbouring restaurant.

Name: Catalonia Park Putxet
Description:
Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

Name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
Description:
Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

Name: Aspasios Charming Flats
Description:
Aspasios Charming Flats offers accommodation in Barcelona. Montjuïc is 900 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and have a seating and dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in every unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Plaza Reial is 1.4 km from Aspasios Charming Flats, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Aspasios Charming Flats.

Name: Praktik Vinoteca
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Praktik Vinoteca hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi in public areas. Universitat Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away.

The bright and soundproofed rooms at Praktik Vinoteca feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property has a terrace where you can enjoy a glass of wine served by the on-site wine expert, who can tell you about local wines and their history.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Paseo de Gracia, with its shops and impressive architecture, is just 600 metres away.

Barcelona Airport is a 45-minute bus ride away from Plaza Catalunya and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km from Praktik Vinoteca.

Name: Classbedroom Born Apartments
Description:
These stylish, modern apartments are located in El Born. Ideal for two guests, these apartments  provide a clean, bright, and airy atmosphere.
With convenient public transport links, including local metro stations, exploring the city’s attractions is a breeze. Plus, you’ll be within walking distance of trendy shops, cozy cafes, and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Atico con Terraza Plz. España / Fira Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station, Atico con Terraza Plz. España / Fira Barcelona offers air conditioning. It is set 3.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 500 metres away.

The apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Sant Agustí
Description:
Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast.

Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day.

Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 700 metres and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport buses.

Name: The Haus Sagrada Familia
Description:
A recently renovated apartment situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, The Haus Sagrada Familia offers accommodation with with a terrace, private parking and free WiFi. This apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from The Haus Sagrada Familia, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views.

All units at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Guests at Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill BBQ cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Casp Green House
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Casp Green House features air-conditioning. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the house.

The bedrooms have a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some rooms come with city view.

Passeig de Gracia shopping street is 650 meters from the property. Arco del Triunfo is an 8-minute walk away. Urquinaona metro station is within 4 minutes’ walk.

RECEPTION and KEY COLLECTION are in situated at street Via Laietana 71, 2º, which is just 7 min walk.

Name: SERHS Carlit Boutique Hotel
Description:
SERHS Carlit Boutique Hotel is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Name: Catalonia Gracia
Description:
This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.

A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.

Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

Name: Alojamiento Rambla
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Tivoli Theatre, Alojamiento Rambla features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is located less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 7-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units include a kettle and a shared bathroom, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia, Portal de l'Angel and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: La Fira - Paralelo 1
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.7 km from Sants Railway Station, La Fira - Paralelo 1 offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The 2-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Andante Hotel
Description:
With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.

Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.

Name: Barceló Sants
Description:
Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has the Oxygen restaurant, where you can enjoy a delicious, complete and healthy breakfast buffet. It also has the Orbital Bar, the ideal space to disconnect from daily life; a fun and perfect place to have a delicious cocktail with your partner or to hang out and have a drink with colleagues after a long working day.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

Name: AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner
Description:
Set at the heart of historical Barcelona and near to many of its most popular sites, this carefully restored hotel is set in a charming, Neoclassical building.

The spacious rooms in the AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner are elegantly decorated with organic colours to highlight the original features of the building.

Splendid decor includes soothing white walls punctuated by Barroque furniture and all is highlighted by plenty of natural light.

The hotel features a communal lounge and kitchen, allowing you to prepare your own meals before heading out to explore the city. Both the kitchen and the lounge are shared in the AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner.

Stroll from this guest accommodation to the famous Las Ramblas  less than 5 minutes away by foot. Nearby are the spectacular Modernist buildings of La Pedrera and Casa Batlló  the well-known architectural work of Antoni Gaudí.

In the evening you can explore the neighbourhoods of Raval and the Gothic Quarter, where you will find numerous restaurants, bars and nightclubs.

Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach.

Name: Catalonia Rigoletto
Description:
The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.
