Description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Barcelona, Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Name: Hostal Argo
Description:
Hostal Argo is a modern guest house located Barcelona, 4 minutes' walk from Diagonal Avenue and 450 metres away from Passeig de Gràcia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.

At Hostal Argo you will find a 24-hour front desk where luggage storage can be provided for free. An exclusive roof-top terrace with limited access is featured during summer season.

Modernist buildings like La Pedrera or Casa Batlló are 8 minutes on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 1 km away. The nearest metro station is Girona, 400 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes by car.

Name: Alcam Flassaders

In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Barceloneta Beach, Alcam Flassaders offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and a 15-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: NH Barcelona Les Corts
Description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
Description:
Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

Until further notice, the use of jacuzzi is prohibited due to the existing drought in Catalonia.

Name: Acta Antibes
Description:
The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.

Whilst visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one kilometre away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 200 metres from the hotel.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Eixample
Description:
Located in a typical Eixample-style building in Barcelona’s Quadrat d’Or, Bonavista Apartments Eixample offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Plaza Catalunya Square is 1.5 km away.

All 2-bedroom apartments feature a modern décor with parquet flooring and contemporary furnishings. Each includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a washing machine and ironing facilities. The fully-equipped kitchenette includes a kettle, microwave and dishwasher.

Bonavista Apartments – Eixample is located on the corner of Enric Granados Street, where guests will find plenty of cafés, bars and restaurants. There is also a supermarket just 1 block away.

Diagonal Metro Stop, servicing lines 3 and 5, is a 5-minute walk away. Barcelona’s FGC urban rail line also stops at Provença, just 250 metres from the apartments and will take you to Plaça Catalunya in about 5 minutes.

Name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
Description:
Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost: please, note that the spa is included for stays in Premium rooms, Junior suites and Suite. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace has a terrace, free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Casa Batllo.

Name: Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only
Description:
Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

Name: Hostal Barcelona Centro
Description:
Within 5 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Gràcia and Catalunya Metro and railway stations, Hostal Barcelona Centro offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at Hostal Barcelona Centro has a flat-screen TV, heating and private bathroom.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found on Passeig de Gràcia and around Las Ramblas, 10 minutes' walking from Hostal Barcelona Centro.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 5 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are within 600 metres of the guest house.

Description:
The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa.

Description:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Name: Catalonia La Maquinista
Description:
Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Name: Dalia Ramblas
Description:
Set 50 metres from the Ramblas, in the Raval district, Dalia Ramblas features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Well served by public transport, it offers 24-hour reception and free luggage storage.

Featuring a modern and functional décor, rooms come with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and a desk. All have a private bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and hairdryer are provided.

Dalia Ramblas is set in the lively city centre. There are plenty of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

Next to the Gothic Quarter, Dalia Ramblas is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and from Barcelona Cathedral. You can also reach the bustling Plaza Reial Square in a 5-minute walk.

Barcelona Airport is 12 km away from the hotel. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

Name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites
Description:
This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Hotel Casa Teva Barcelona
Description:
Located in the lively Raval district and 250 metres from Las Ramblas, Hotel Casa Teva Barcelona has easy access to Barcelona’s Old Town. It features 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

Gaudi‘s Palau Güell is only 100 metres from the hotel, whilst La Boqueria Market is just a 5-minute walk away.

There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the surrounding area. Barcelona’s Old Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Drassanes Metro Station is approximately 500 metres from the hotel.  Guests can reach sights such as the Sagrada Familia and Parc Güell in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

Name: Generator Barcelona
Description:
Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

Name: Hostal Elkano
Description:
This family-run guest house is 500 metres from Barcelona’s Fira Exhibition Centre at Plaza España. It offers heated rooms with free Wi-Fi, 200 metres from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Spacious rooms at Hostal Elkano feature functional décor and a TV. Bathrooms are shared or private.

You will find numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk. Sant Antoni Market is 500 metres away and the Arenas Shopping Centre, a former bullring, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Elkano’s 24-hour reception offers tourist information. Montjuic Park, with the Olympic Stadium, its museums and outdoor swimming pools, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The property is 10 minutes’ walk from the ferry port. Las Ramblas is 3 metro stops away and chic Passeig de Gracias, 5 stops away. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Plaza España.

Name: Paral·lel
Description:
Situated just 10 minutes walk from the stunning centre of Barcelona, this smart and practical hotel is set in the charming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, at the foot of Montjüic, where you can visit the Olympic site.

Start your day with breakfast in Paral.lel, before heading out for a stroll up Montjüic, where you can spend the day relaxing in a natural setting, and also visit museums such as Fundació Joan Mirò and the national gallery, MNAC.

Each of the bedrooms in Paral.lel comes with air conditioning, so you can enjoy tranquillity and rest in the warm summer months. Browse the internet using the free Wi-Fi connection available in this hotel.

Paral.lel is located just a short stroll from the port and beach area of the city, and you can get to top sights such as Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter with its stunning cathedral.

Name: Zenit Barcelona

Situated in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Apartamento para 2 céntrico offers air conditioning. It is set 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. This pet-friendly apartment also has free WiFi.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: NH Barcelona Entenza
Description:
NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

Name: Hotel Astoria

The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa

Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

Name: The Loft House - Barcelona La Pedrera
Description:
The Loft House - Barcelona La Pedrera is located just a two-minute walk from Gaudi's house La Pedrera. Our hostel is 400 meters from Diagonal Metro Station, you are also able to walk to La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is just a ten-minute metro ride away.

There are many bars, supermarkets, and restaurants around the property, you can walk to Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and its designer boutiques in three minutes. The popular district of Gracia is 600 meters away.

In our commitment to sustainability, The Loft House is proud to operate as a carbon-neutral property, working diligently to minimize our environmental footprint. We implement eco-friendly practices throughout the property and continuously strive to reduce our energy consumption and waste.

Boasting a grand entrance hall with beautiful mosaic floor tiles, the property includes a well-equipped shared kitchen for guests. Personal lockers in shared bedrooms. Bed linen and blankets are provided.

Free WiFi and two communal gardens with outdoor furniture. For a surcharge, guests may hire towels and make use of the laundry service.

Name: Allegro Barcelona
Description:
Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

Name: Hostel New York
Description:
Hostel New York is a youth hostel located in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi, 500 metres from Jaume and Drassanes Metro Stations.

The hostel’s simple dormitory rooms feature modest décor, bunk beds and individual lockers. They include access to a shared bathroom; and free bed linen are provided.

There is a kitchen available for guests in the evenings and a TV lounge with vending machines selling drinks and snacks. There are also 2 computers.

New York is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s sights by foot. Ciutadella Park is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 15 minutes's walk away.

The ferry port bus is a 10-minute walk from the hostel and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 20 minutes’ walk away.

Description:
Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi, a seasonal roof top terrace and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

Description:
Offering free WiFi, BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona, 400 metres from Liceu Metro Station.

These modern, luxury apartments include a seating area with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, oven, coffee machine and a microwave, and the private bathrooms also come with a shower and a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the rooms.

Located in the Gothic Quarter, guests will find many bars and restaurants within minutes of the apartments. Las Ramblas is a 2-minute walk away.

BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa are 500 metres from Plaça Catalunya, and a 20-minute metro ride will take you to Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Name: Mosaic by Ona
Description:
Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic by Ona.

Name: Petit Hotel
Description:
The Petit Hotel guest house is situated in the Sarrià-Sant Gervasi district of Barcelona and 350 metres from the Metro station, Muntaner. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms at the Petit guest house are spacious and feature bright décor. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a TV and minibar.

Facilities include luggage storage and breakfast service. The area of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi has many restaurants and cafés.

Las Ramblas and the centre of Barcelona can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by train. Local attractions include Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, which can be reached in around 20 minutes, by foot.

Parking is available nearby. Guests of the Petit Hotel have a discount, please contact for more information.

Name: Petit Palace Boqueria Garden
Description:
The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 10 meters from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).

Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.

The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.

Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 800 meters away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

Name: Mambo Tango
Description:
Mambo Tango is a backpackers’ hostel located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec district, just 100 metres from Parallel Metro Station. It offers free daily activities and free Wi-Fi access.

Mambo Tango Hostel offers colourful dormitories and private rooms, all with air conditioning, heating and individual lockers.

You can prepare meals in the Mambo Tango’s shared kitchen, or enjoy a film in the TV lounge. The hotel’s free activities include photo exhibitions, music classes and city walks.

Staff can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, as well as help with ticket reservations and discounts. The property also organizes daily guided walking tours and night tours to bars and nightclubs. The famous Gaudí houses are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hostel.

Situated at the foot of Montjuïc Hill, the hostel is an ideal base for visiting Montjuïc Castle and the Magic Fountains. The lively Raval district is just a 5-minute walk away.

Situated on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, these apartments are 150 metres from Monumental Metro Station. All the apartments at Diagonal Apartments are air-conditioned and have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments are also heated and include an equipped kitchen. The building has a lift and a shared rooftop terrace with a picnic area.

Within 10 minutes' walk you can find plenty of supermarkets and other shops, as well as the Glòries Shopping Centre.

Description:
Situated conveniently in Barcelona, SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This 1-star guest house offers a lift and a shared kitchen. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units come with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. At the guest house, the units are fitted with a private bathroom and bed linen.

A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Catedral
Description:
There is a gym and a rooftop chill-out terrace with a swimming pool and wonderful city views. It is located 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral, in the historic Gothic Quarter.

Each elegant room at the Barcelona Catedral Hotel features wooden flooring and air conditioning. Rooms have free WiFi, a laptop safe and flat-screen TV with international channels. Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms, but there are common areas where smoking is allowed.

Creative Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel’s 4 Capellans restaurant, which offers a menu for celiacs. There is a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, including many in the popular El Born district.

Hotel Barcelona Catedral is 450 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, while Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away.

Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Click&Flat Sugranyes offers air conditioning. It is situated 3.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.8 km away.

Name: Studio Hostel
Description:
Studio Hostel is set in the residential district of Sarrià, 50 metres from Reina Elisenda Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, free breakfast, a roof terrace and rooms with private bathrooms.

Rooms at the Studio are brightly decorated. Each has heating and a desk.

The Albergue has a communal lounge with a TV and there is also a reading area. There are vending machines in the reception and guests can make use of the fridge, microwave and kettle in the shared area.

Set just off Passeig de la Bonanova, the hostel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of restaurants, cafés and bars. The popular Gràcia district is just 5 train stops away.

Staff at the Studio’s can provide information on Barcelona’s many tourist attractions. The city centre is 20 minutes from Reina Elisenda Station, and free on-street parking is available nearby.

Name: Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona
Description:
This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi.

Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested.

Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year.

The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions.

The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

Name: Barcelona Princess
Description:
Barcelona Princess Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the beach in the city’s Forum area. It offers wonderful views and a free gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All guests have free access to the 2 heated outdoor pools. The one on the 23rd floor offers spectacular sea views.

Rooms at Princess Barcelona are elegant and bright. Each has contemporary décor. All rooms have satellite TV.

The hotel has a Mediterranean restaurant and 2 stylish bars, including a relaxed poolside bar with panoramic views.

Princess Hotel Barcelona is set on Avenida Diagonal, next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. The tour bus stops in front of the hotel and Maresme Forum Metro Station is 100 metres away. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro.

Meeting Point Hostels is located just behind Barcelona Sants train station and offers free WiFi.

Both private and shared rooms are offered. The rooms have air conditioning and heating, and all beds have an individual reading light, a small shelf and a power socket. Free lockers secured with keycard locks are available. A luggage storage room is available on request.

Central Barcelona can be reached in around 10 minutes by train. Plaça d'Espanya and Fira de Barcelona are a 20-minute walk away from Meeting Point Hostels.

Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute metro ride from Meeting Point Hostels, while Camp Nou Stadium is a 20-minute walk away.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Republica

Located 150 metres from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.

The Republica has a concierge service that can help organise activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Glories Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

Each stylish Ding Dong Fira Apartment is decorated in light colours, with smart wooden floors. Apartments have a lounge with a sofa bed, and air conditioning and heating is available in the lounge only.

A range of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Fira Apartments by Gaiarooms. The famous Magic Fountain and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are both within 100 metres.

Espanya Metro Station, 250 metres away, offers direct metro services within 10 minutes to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Buses to and from the airport, as well as city tour buses, stop 3 minutes' walk from the apartments.

Name: Hotel Turin Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 50 meters from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.

It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and minibar.

The Turin Hotel is located just 150 meters from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.

The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

Name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
Description:
Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

Name: B-Garden BCN
Description:
BGarden BCN is a small and cozy guest-house which offers a personalized service.
Housed in a Art Nouveau building and placed in one of the best locations in Barcelona for travelers, our goal is to make guests feel at home.

It is 10 min by foot to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, Plaça Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Arc de Triumf. You can find all kind of shops, restaurants and bars nearby.
As you were in a typical Spanish 1900’s house with authentical vitreaux and high ceilings, B-Garden BCN offers rooms with private balcony and most of them have private and renovated bathrooms.
All the rooms at B-Garden BCN feature tiled floors and stylish dècor, with a mix of antique and modern mobiliary. We offer flat-screen Smart T.V, free Wi-Fi connection and a varied buffet breakfast.
Barcelona’s charming Born district is just 7 minutes’ walk from B-Garden BCN. Here you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana and a Modernist Auditorium.
Tetuán metro station is only 100 metres away and it connects you with the rest of the city, as well as all the buses options in Gran Via de les corts catalanes avenue, just round the corner.

Name: Hotel Casa Trafalgar Barcelona
Description:
Casa Trafalgar is located in Plaza Urquinaona, just a few minutes from the vibrant Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia, where the city's best shops and restaurants are located.

Casa Trafalgar offers three-room models. The economic one has the same quality as the other types of rooms but has limited natural light. The small room with a balcony,  offers a large window with views of Plaza Urquinaona. And the standard interior rooms offer great tranquility as they are located in the hotel's backyard.

All rooms have Chromecast technology and Smart TV. In addition to a complete bathroom with shower and aromatherapy amenities. The air conditioning is individually controlled in each room, which also has an ultra-silent fan that improves rest in summer.

The mattresses and pillows are very comfortable and of high quality, with hypoallergenic duvets adapted to each season and temperature of the year.

The reception offers luggage storage service both on the check-in day and on the check-out day, helps in booking visits to monuments and restaurant reservations. Casa Trafalgar strives to make your stay in Barcelona easy and very comfortable.

Name: Ola Living Hostal Diagonal

Featuring free WiFi, Ola Living Hostal Diagonal is located in Barcelona. Set 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, this hotel offers modern rooms with air conditioning.

Our reception is located at 228 Aribau Street. The opening hours are from 09:00 to 20:00, Monday to Sunday.

Name: H10 Casa Mimosa 4* Sup
Description:
Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Name: Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza
Description:
The striking Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is set directly on the square, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a lovely chill-out terrace.

The stylish rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza have lightly coloured contemporary décor. All feature a coffee maker with 2 free capsules, a safe, minibar and 1 bottle of water per person on arrival. A luxury apartment is also available.

Modern bathrooms include H10 toiletries, a hairdryer, magnifying mirror, a bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms also have views of the square or feature a terrace.

Dating from the 19th century, the hotel combines original ornate tiles, murals and carved wooden doors with modern finishes.

The 1892 Restaurant offers traditional Catalan dishes, a Modernist ceiling and great views of the square. There is also a lobby-bar and a library.

The H10 has a 24-hour reception, where staff can provide you with information on Barcelona. There is also a 24-hour internet terminal.

Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is just 20 metres from Catalunya Metro and train stations. The Aerobus shuttle to Barcelona Airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada

Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada has fantastic views of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the sea from its roof terrace and hot tub. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada feature parquet floors and natural light. Each one comes with a minibar, a free safe, and a flat-screen TV with international satellite channels.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are also 2 bars, including the Sunset Bar located on the roof terrace. Room service is also available.

The attentive staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Bicycle and car rental services can also be arranged.

Barcelona's main tourist attractions such as the Cathedral, the Ramblas and the Picasso Museum are within walking distance of the hotel.

Name: Novotel Barcelona City
Description:
Novotel Barcelona City is situated in the avant-garde area of the city just 15 minutes from central Barcelona, next to the Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel.

Moreover, the unique Sagrada Familia and Bogatell Beach are just a few minutes away, walking from the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Novotel Barcelona City have simple, modern décor. Up to 2 children under 16 stay for free when sharing with parents. The rooms include free Wi fi and flat screen satellite TV.

The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Mediterranean food and the typical paella.

On the rooftop there is an outdoor swimming pool and a gourmet bar where guests can enjoy tapas, wines and cocktails enjoying panoramic city views.

This hotel offers a free gym and a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool and panoramic views of Barcelona.

Tram and bus services to the city center stop outside the hotel. Glòries Metro Station is just 300 metres away.

The reception staff will be more than happy to provide you with all the tips and tricks to make your stay in Barcelona unforgettable! Don't hesitate to stop by for recommendations on must-see attractions, restaurants, and so much more.

Business travellers particularly like the location.

All stylish rooms at Serras are air conditioned and soundproofed, featuring a private balcony with views of Barcelona's Port Vell or Mercè Street in the Gothic Quarter. Each comes with state-of-the-art facilities such as a Smart HD TV, wireless sound system and bathrooms with bathrobes and slippers.

Featuring attractive sea views, guests can have a signature cocktail on the stylish lounge in the rooftop terrace, while listening to chill-out music. The mezzanine level in Serras Barcelona features a cosy library with bar, while the restaurant serves Catalan specialities and Mediterranean tapas. The restaurant opens for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

This boutique hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Picasso Museum and Estaciò de França Railway Station. Plaça Reial Square is 650 metres away, and Santa María del Mar Cathedral is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 minutes by car.

Name: Aparthotel Allada 3*
Description:
Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Aramunt
Description:

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

Name: Ilunion Barcelona
Description:
Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

Name: Mercer Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is set in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls.

The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower.

The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers.

Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel.

Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

Name: Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup
Description:
Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona's Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi train stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a working area with unlimited coffee and tea from 10:30 am.

All rooms at Pol & Grace Hotel include a minibar, a free safe and the bathrooms are fully equipped with toiletries.

There is also a 24-hour reception with taxi service, tourist information and private parking.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away and offers direct connections to Plaza Catalunya Square, Las Ramblas and Park Güell. The property is a 2-minute walk from the famous Gracia district, where guests can find numerous shops, restaurants and bars.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

Name: Aspasios Urquinaona Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Urquinaona Apartments is in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Eixample district, only 5 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya and Arc de Triomf. Each bright apartment has free Wi-Fi.

The Urquinaona Design Apartments have elegant, modern design. They are air-conditioned and bright, with an open-plan living area with flat-screen TV and kitchen.

Name: InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Magic Fountain, the elegant InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and hydromassage shower.

Offering fantastic views over Barcelona, the hotel’s 173 Rooftop Terrace features an outdoor pool, sun loungers, and a dining area where guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and a selection of drinks and cocktails.

Arrel Restaurant pays homage to the land and the produce it provides throughout all seasons of the year. The restaurant features an open kitchen serving small portions to share, buffet breakfasts and lunch and dinner service.

Quirat Restaurant is an exclusive space that will offer an interpretation of the land and its products through a menu of dishes that responds to the different seasons, designed exclusively for the restaurant by a Chef with 1 Michelin Star. Enjoy an unforgettable dinner in the most exclusive of our restaurants.

Gebre Cocktails and More and, in addition to the cocktail classics, it will offer a menu of artisan signature cocktails that will try to convey a very specific sensory experience connected to the world of the land that surrounds us.

There is free WiFi available in public areas and in rooms and the lobby area at InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel features a free internet point.

The spa has a water circuit, a dry sauna, a hammam, hot tub, gym, and 6 treatment cabins.

From the hotel, Barcelona’s historic centre can be easily reached by bus or metro. Poble Sec and Espanya Metro Stations are both 500 metres away. Poble Espanyol and the Joan Miró Foundation are 200 metres away.

Name: Room Mate Anna
Description:
Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Neri – Relais & Chateaux
Description:
This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings.

Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona.

Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace.

Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument.

Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

Name: Acevi Villarroel
Description:
Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya.

Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV.

Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available free of charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace.

Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Name: Monument Hotel
Description:
Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Description:
The One Barcelona GL has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Name: Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla
Description:
Situated on the famous Ramblas, Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla has a beautiful interior courtyard and a terrace from where you can enjoy views over the Gothic Quarter while you sip an espresso.

 Return here for lunch and enjoy views over the urban gardens which date back to the Romantic era.

The Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla is a celebration of the Art Deco style which has become a signature of this Catalan city. Enjoy theatrical interiors which combine classic style with avant garde features such as clever lighting and contemporary furniture. Sit in the interior patio of the Rivoli Ramblas where you can enjoy the cool surroundings and murals painted on the walls.

The 128 Rambla Restaurant serves a wide selection of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The varied and appealing buffet breakfast is a great way to help prepare you for the day ahead.

Name: Vincci Bit
Description:
Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

Description:
Alma Barcelona is set in an attractive building just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia. It offers a spa, a stylish restaurant with a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Alma Barcelona rooms feature smart, modern décor and leather armchairs. They are equipped with a flat-screen Loewe TV, Punkt phone, and the private bathrooms come with a bathrobe and slippers.

The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available.

Staff at the Alma’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions. On request, the hotel offers an airport shuttle service to Barcelona El Prat Airport, a 25-minute drive away.

The hotel is just one block from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 5-minute walk from Casa Batlló. You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 5 minutes, while Plaza de Catalunya is just over 1 km away.

Description:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

Name: Vincci Maritimo
Description:
Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

Name: Hotel Regina Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Regina Barcelona is set in a historic 19th-century building, just 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. The hotel offers free high-speed WiFi and modern rooms.

The century-old hotel was founded in 1917 and features beautiful architecture, including its impressive art nouveau entrance.

The Hotel Regina Barcelona’s spacious rooms come with air conditioning, central heating and satellite TV. There is free tea and coffee, a safe, work desk and minibar. The private bathroom includes ecological cosmetics and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. There is also a bar and room service is offered all day from 07:00 to 00:00.

The Regina has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, are within a 10-minute walk away. Catalunya Metro and Train Station and the airport bus stop are within 5 minutes' walk.

Name: Grand Hyatt Barcelona
Description:
A five star iconic hotel located on the renowned Avenida Diagonal, in the heart of Barcelona's most exclusive residential, financial and shopping district: the Alta Barcelona.

Experience the ultimate luxury, and live where the best of Barcelona lives, where Grand Hyatt chooses to be: a captivating destination within another destination. Combining design with sophistication, it is the most exclusive gastronomical and vibrant destination, for an unparalleled experience.

With 465 rooms including 49 suites and a penthouse, 5 gastronomy spaces, a Wellness & Spa area and an outdoor area with terrace and pool, Grand Hyatt Barcelona is the perfect choice for a lavish and unforgettable getaway.

Designer rooms at Grand Hyatt Barcelona offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, air conditioning and free WiFi. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Oasis Spa by Natura Bissé houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Kindly be informed that the minimum age for entering the Spa is 18.

Grand Hyatt Barcelona is 5-minute walking from Football Club Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium, 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes on foot.

Name: Vincci Gala
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

Name: Gran Hotel Barcino
Description:
Surrounded by the fascinating streets of the Gothic Quarter, this elegant hotel is located right at Barcelona’s historic heart – just a short walk from the cathedral and Las Ramblas.

The Gran Hotel Barcino is set in a street which runs off the magnificent square of Sant Jaume, home to both the Catalonian government and the city council. The narrow streets which surround the hotel are full of fashionable shops, historic sites and museums, such as the Picasso Museum.

See the city’s many sights then return for a good night’s sleep in your traditional-style room. The rooms feature marble floors and air conditioning.

Name: Casa Camper Barcelona
Description:
Boutique Hotel in Barcelona. Just off La Rambla, in the city centre’s vibrant, diverse and historic Raval quarter, our 40-room boutique hotel is in a converted 19th-century building near the MACBA, the bustling Boqueria market, and a 5-minute walk from Plaza Cataluña.

Rooms with a vibe. Functional and comfortable rooms for all preferences, from Twin to Suite with garden or city views. Whatever you choose, you'll be sure to enjoy big beds, open wardrobes, and clever design details.

Eat & Drink. Home is where the food is. Drinks and snacks at our 24-hour Tentempie buffet, not to mention Michelin-starred dining in Dos Palillos, followed by cocktails at our Dos Billares bar, Casa Camper Barcelona will always keep you happily fed.

Our neighbourhood. You're in the Raval, Ravaleja! Casa Camper Barcelona puts you in the middle of the authentic Barcelona neighborhood life, with countless bars, restaurants, and galleries, including MACBA and its skaters. Our location is perfect for you to explore the city and its most authentic essence, just steps from the iconic works of Gaudí and surrounded by streets full of art and culture. Immerse yourself in the unique fusion of history, design, and tradition. Tired of exploring? Retreat to our sunny rooftop terrace for a drink and panoramic views of the city.

Name: Mercer House Bòria BCN
Description:
This chic boutique hotel blends a carefully preserved, 18th-century setting with the most modern and impressive interior design. It lies in the fashionable La Ribera district of central Barcelona.

The Mercer House Bòria BCN is set in amongst the narrow, atmospheric streets just to the north of the famous El Born district. Its original 18th-century façade has been well-preserved and adds to the hotel’s unique charm. Inside, each suite and room has a clean, contemporary style complemented by works of modern art by young local artists.

To get an idea of the Boria’s great location, head to its own rooftop sun terrace, where you can look out over the city’s Gothic cathedral, the beautiful nearby church of Santa María del Mar and the Old Port beyond.

Name: W Barcelona
Description:
W Barcelona is a striking sail-like structure next to Barceloneta Beach, offering breathtaking design and fantastic views over Barcelona. It features a spa, infinity pool, rooftop bar and luxurious rooms.

The W Hotel’s impressive rooms feature avant-garde design and views of the Mediterranean or the city. They all come with a chaise lounge, flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and rainfall shower.

The W has a stylish gourmet restaurant, FIRE; and you can enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views over the city and sea at NOXE rooftop bar, located on the 26th floor. Cocktails are also offered in the W Lounge. The SALT Beach Club & Restaurant has a menu of innovative burgers accompanied by specially designed cocktails to live the ultimate burger by the beach experience.

There are two pools, SUN Deck and WET Deck, which are surrounded by decking with loungers. The hotel also has direct beach access. Facilities at the W Spa include a hot tub, sauna and steam room, and a brand new relaxation area, GETAWAY, is available from 2018. A wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments is available.

The W is 20 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Metro Station, and buses stop outside the hotel.

Name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Name: H10 Universitat
Description:
Ideally located just 100 metres off Barcelona’s central Plaça Catalunya and the exciting Las Ramblas, this new hotel blends a 19th-century façade with 21st-century decor and facilities.

The H10 Universitat lies in the cultural heart of this cosmopolitan city, allowing you to easily walk to many of the city’s unique sights. It is full of stylish, contemporary design and modern art. State-of-the-art amenities include free Wi-Fi available throughout the building.
